name: Iphone 14 Pro
description: Apple uses Sony sensors for their Iphones.

name: Iphone XS
description: Apple uses Sony sensors for their Iphones.

name: Panavision DXL2
description: This camera uses the RED Monstro 8K sensor.

name: RED Dragon
description: The sensor sizes are the same for all Dragon sensors, regardless of Dragon-X, MG, CF, S35, 5K, or 6K designations.

name: RED Gemini
description: The sensor sizes are the same for all Gemini sensors, regardless of S35, or 5K designations.

name: RED Monstro
description: The sensor sizes are the same for all Monstro sensors, regardless of 8K, VK, or Monochrome designations.

name: RED V-Raptor
description: The sensor sizes are the same for all V-Raptor sensors, regardless of 8K, or VV designations.

name: Sony VENICE 2
description: Sony VENICE 2 has two sensor options, an 8K (MPC-3628) and a 6K (MPC-3626).
